Source code for partition

from disk import *
import disk



[docs]class Partition(object):
    def __init__(self, disk, start, end):
        self._start = start
        self._end = end
        self._disk = disk


[docs]    def valid(self, bid):
        return ULT(bid, self._end - self._start)



[docs]    def read(self, bid):
        return self._disk.read(bid + self._start)



[docs]    def write(self, bid, block):
        disk.assertion(self.valid(bid))
        self._disk.write(bid + self._start, block)



[docs]    def flush(self):
        self._disk.flush()



[docs]    def crash(self, mach):
        return self.__class__(self._disk.crash(mach), self._start, self._end)
